name: ssdifss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpan(wss(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wa(wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0)
-| wi(wa(wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))
-| wi(wa(wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wss(cdif(c0, c2), c0), wss(c0, c1)), wss(cdif(c0, c2), c1))

comment: Preservation of a subclass relationship by class difference. (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2007.)
